creator: jmeter@erlewein.org
text:
I want to see only certain steps in my script. And it is difficult wading through tons of data in the "View Results Tree" view. 

It would be nice if there were a filter functionality. Maybe on the Sample Name. Wouldn't matter to me if it is before or after the fact. i.e. filter results after they have been generated or filter results before they even get recorded (which would make more sense as it also allows to cut down data volumes during the test).

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Listeners only "see" samples which are in scope.

So you can just add the listeners as children of the samples you are interested in.

Having said that, there might be a use-case for filtering samples.
In which case it should probably allow for both includes and excludes
